tool_description: This API that lists all 31 public holidays for all 13 provinces and territories in Canada, including federal holidays.
name: Canada Holidays
title: Canada Holidays

api_list.name: Holidays
api_list.description: Returns Canadian public holidays. Each holiday lists the regions that observe it.

optional_parameters.name: optional
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

optional_parameters.name: federal
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter. If true or 1, will return only federal holidays. If false or 0, will return no federal holidays.

items.title: Holiday
items.description: A Canadian holiday. Includes a name, the literal date of the holiday, the observed date of the holiday (ie, accommodating for weekends), and a list of regions that observe this holiday.

date.description: ISO date: the literal date of the holiday

federal.description: Whether this holiday is observed by federally-regulated industries.

observedDate.description: ISO date: when this holiday is observed

sourceLink.description: URL to public holidays reference for this region

sourceEn.description: Name of reference page with public holidays for this region

optional.description: Whether this province optionally observes a given holiday.
Whether this is a province-wide statutory holiday, or one that is optional for employers.

api_list.name: Holiday
api_list.description: Returns one Canadian statutory holiday by integer id. Returns a 404 response for invalid ids.

optional_parameters.name: optional
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return provinces for which this is a legislated holiday. If true or 1, will return provinces which optionally celebrate this holiday.

holiday.title: Holiday
holiday.description: A Canadian holiday. Includes a name, the literal date of the holiday, the observed date of the holiday (ie, accommodating for weekends), and a list of regions that observe this holiday.

date.description: ISO date: the literal date of the holiday

federal.description: Whether this holiday is observed by federally-regulated industries.

observedDate.description: ISO date: when this holiday is observed

sourceLink.description: URL to public holidays reference for this region

sourceEn.description: Name of reference page with public holidays for this region

optional.description: Whether this province optionally observes a given holiday.
Whether this is a province-wide statutory holiday, or one that is optional for employers.

api_list.name: Province
api_list.description: Returns a Canadian province or territory with its associated holidays. Returns a 404 response for invalid abbreviations.

optional_parameters.name: optional
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter (AB and BC only). If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

sourceLink.description: URL to public holidays reference for this region

sourceEn.description: Name of reference page with public holidays for this region

optional.description: Whether this province optionally observes a given holiday.

api_list.name: Root
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Provinces
api_list.description: Returns provinces and territories in Canada. Each province or territory lists its associated holidays.

optional_parameters.name: optional
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

sourceLink.description: URL to public holidays reference for this region

sourceEn.description: Name of reference page with public holidays for this region

optional.description: Whether this province optionally observes a given holiday.

api_list.name: Spec
api_list.description: Gets the schema for the JSON API as a yaml file.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/spec"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/spec"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
